amendment.description: Amendment sets a 5 percent procurement goal for Federal contracting with "green" small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-137 to set a 5 percent procurement goal for the Federal government to contract with "green" small businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch (VT) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Welch (VT).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch (VT) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
